name: [PC] FPS Prototype
description:
This is a little FPS Prototype. If I want to create a FPS in the future, it will probably be a base to use :)

This prototype will be even more big than the platformer one. I will be working on maps and guns.

The Prototype use Unreal Engine 5 and it's recommended to use an RTX. It runs with Lumen, RTX and DirectX 12 so, I don't know if it's gonna work on non-rtx graphics cards.

== Features ==

- A little Test Maps (More maps coming soon)

- UE4 gun with an auto or single shot mode

- Water and Swimming (Not finished)

- Footsteps sounds (Not finished)

- Settings Menu

- French + English (More languages coming soon)
